de.iabg.mesh
Interface MeshConnectionUI

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMeshConnectionUI
public interface MeshConnectionUI

This interface declares basic functionality for the user interface of a JMeshConnectionPanel. This interface tries to follow the structure described in Swing for a Model-View-Controller. Generally, the JMeshConnectionPanel is instantiated and then a MeshConnectionUI is installed onto it. Any implementing classes of this interface must be able to add and remove their own layout, components, listeners, keyboard actions, and defaults. If the user interface is not completely uninstalled when called, it can lead to unpredictable results in the JMeshConnectionPanel.

Version:
September 10, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE

Method Summary

          Installs layout, components, listeners, keyboard actions, defaults, and initializes any values or fields.
 void uninstallUI(JMeshConnectionPanel connectionPanel)
          Uninstalls layout, components, listeners, keyboard actions, and defaults.
